title: Bramley apple and blackberry millefeuille tart
description: Autumnal flavours shine through in this French pastry made with homemade rough puff. It’s easier than you might think.Equipment and preparation: you will need a piping bag.
ingredients: 250g/9oz plain flour, plus extra for flouring
250g/9oz very cold butter, cut into small cubes
2 large Bramley apples, peeled and roughly chopped
1 vanilla pod, split and seeds scraped
